tool_description: Get Alerts, Traffic Jams Information and Driving Directions from Waze / Google in Real-Time.
name: Waze
title: Waze

api_list.name: Autocomplete
api_list.description: Waze/Google autocomplete/type-ahead for places, locations and addresses.

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: The language of the results. See https://wazeopedia.waze.com/wiki/USA/Countries_and_Languages for a list of supported languages.

optional_parameters.name: coordinates
optional_parameters.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude) bias. Highly recommended to use for getting accurate results.

api_list.name: Driving Directions
api_list.description: Get routes and driving directions from Waze/Google.

required_parameters.name: source_coordinates
required_parameters.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the starting point

required_parameters.name: destination_coordinates
required_parameters.description: Geographic coordinates (latitude, longitude pair) of the destination

optional_parameters.name: return_route_coordinates
optional_parameters.description: Whether to return route coordinate pairs (`route_coordinates` field)

optional_parameters.name: arrival_timestamp
optional_parameters.description: Unix-timestamp (seconds since epoch) of the arrival time (in case not specified directions will be returned for current time)

api_list.name: Alerts and Jams
api_list.description: Get real-time alerts and jams from Waze in a geographic rectangular area defined by bottom-left and top-right latitude, longitude pairs.

required_parameters.name: top_right
required_parameters.description: Top-right corner of the geographic rectangular area for which to get alerts and traffic jams. Specified as latitude, longitude pair.

required_parameters.name: bottom_left
required_parameters.description: Bottom-left corner of the geographic rectangular area for which to get alerts and traffic jams. Specified as latitude, longitude pair.

optional_parameters.name: max_alerts
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of alerts to fetch (to avoid fetching alerts set it to `0`).
Default: `20`

optional_parameters.name: max_jams
optional_parameters.description:
Maximum number of traffic jams to fetch (to avoid fetching traffic jams, set it to `0`).
Default: `20`
